participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, enjoys gaming and social events.
participant_1.background: on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i like donuts. i drive a ford pinto. i play a lot of call of duty.

participant_2.personality: Ambitious and friendly, loves being involved in school activities.
participant_2.background: i won homecoming queen this year. my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i'm currently in high school.

content.text: Hey, are you here? What's up?
